main.name: Joseph Nchimunya
main.occupation: Full-stack Developer | Backend Specialist | Mobile App Developer
main.description: Passionate about building innovative web and mobile solutions that make a meaningful impact.
main.bio: I'm Joseph Matthias Nchimunya, a Full-Stack Developer with expertise in backend programming and mobile app development. I hold a Computer Science degree from Gideons Roberts University and specialize in building scalable applications with technologies like Node.js, Python (Flask), and React, along with experience in MySQL, PostgreSQL, and MongoDB. I also have a strong background in mobile development using Kotlin, Java, and React Native. Currently, I'm working on projects like a Roommate Matching System and an Automated Garden App, utilizing tools like Retrofit, Ktor, Jetpack, and Dagger-Hilt. As a former Teaching Assistant and Backend Developer Tutor, I've mentored students in web and mobile development. Outside of coding, I'm passionate about sound engineering and sharing my knowledge to help others grow in tech.
main.contactmessage: Feel free to reach out! I'm always open to discussing exciting opportunities, collaborations, or sharing insights on tech.

education.description: Graduated with Upper Second Class Honours

work.title: CO - Founder and CTO
work.description: As Co-Founder and CTO at 4Thrifters, I lead the technical vision and development of the platform, overseeing both front-end and back-end architecture. I build scalable solutions, optimize system performance, and create innovative features to enhance the user experience. Additionally, I work on developing and integrating AI models to drive intelligent features within the platform. My role also includes guiding the team through technical challenges and ensuring seamless collaboration across all technical domains.

work.title: Computer Skills Trainer
work.description: I train individuals in Computer Studies and practical applications of software packages like the Windows Office Suite. My goal is to equip students with essential computer skills, enabling them to effectively use software tools for personal and professional tasks.

work.title: Computer Science Tutor
work.description: I tutor students in web and mobile development, focusing on backend programming with technologies like Node.js, Python, and database management. I guide students through their learning journey, help with coding challenges, and support practical and theoretical development.

work.title: Teaching Assistant, Web Development
work.description: I supported instructors in delivering web development courses, assisted students with practical coding sessions, evaluated assignments, and facilitated workshops. I focused on fostering a collaborative learning environment and providing personalized support to help students succeed.

projects.title: To-Do List API (Node JS & Express Js)

testimonials.text: Working with Joseph Matthias Nchimunya has been a game-changer for 4Thrifters. As the Co-Founder and CTO, Joseph has consistently demonstrated an exceptional blend of technical expertise, innovative thinking, and leadership. His ability to seamlessly handle both front-end and back-end development, coupled with his work on AI models, has been integral to our platform's success. Beyond his technical prowess, Joseph is a true team player who brings energy, focus, and an unwavering commitment to excellence. I'm grateful for his contributions and excited about what we will continue to achieve together.

Joseph Matthias Nchimunya has been an invaluable asset to our team at Mukono College. As a Backend Developer and Web & Mobile App Development Tutor, he demonstrated not only a deep technical proficiency but also an exceptional ability to communicate complex concepts to students with ease. His dedication to fostering a positive learning environment and providing hands-on support has had a lasting impact on many students. Josephâ€™s passion for teaching, coupled with his expertise in backend technologies, has truly set him apart as a leader in the tech education space. I am confident that Joseph will continue to achieve great things in his career.
